p: Different prevention and control measures were implemented in different risk areas. In low-risk areas the main focus was to prevent import of outside cases with the economy restored back to normal. In medium-risk areas, both preventing internal and external spread was implemented, and screening of body temperature and disinfection of public facilities was continued. The entertainment industry remained closed, but other business activities resumed. In high-risk areas, strict quarantine and control measures were continued, with continued closure of nonessential businesses.
